title: COFyBCF -
description: Colegio Oficial de Farmacéuticos y Bioquímicos de la Capital Federal
cleaned_text: syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'UNION select * from curso inner join grupo_curso on (gcu_id ...' at line 8] select * from curso inner join grupo_curso on cur_gcu_id) where cur_gcu_id != 2 and - 1 DAY and -- cur_fechaInicio >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY and cur_id = UNION select * from curso inner join grupo_curso on (gcu_id = cur_gcu_id) where cur_gcu_id = 2 and cur_fechaFin >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY and cur_id = order by cur_fechaInicio asc, cur_orden asc, cur_id asc
